name: .KRA~ File Extension
summary: Learn about .KRA~ files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: To open a KRA~ file, first remove the ~ from the file's extension. Then, open the file with Krita as you would any KRA file (by selecting File â†’ Open...).
You can also view the image a KRA~ file contains with qView, a multiplatform image viewer.
